Institution Name: ONDO STATE UNIVERSITY OF MEDICAL SCIENCES, LAJE ROAD, ONDO, ONDO STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Have passed WAEC or NECO with minimum of 5 credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics in one sitting, prospective candidates must have acquired any one of the following:

i. A minimum of grade C pass at Higher School Certificate advanced level or its equivalent in Biology, Chemistry and Physics in not more than one sitting.

ii. A minimum of second class degree in any of the basic sciences or basic medical sciences from University of Medical Sciences or any recognized University.

iii. Be a holder of a diploma (upper credit) from Medical Rehabilitation Therapists Board accredited programmes.
UTME Requirements: Credits in Chemistry, Physics, Biology, English Language and Mathematics in the West African School Certificate Examination (WASCE) or National Examination Council (NECO) provided that all subjects are taken and passed in one sitting.

UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

Direct Entry Requirements: Entry into undergraduate year two i.e. 200 Level is for holders of  credit passes in NCE,  GCE  Advanced  Level,  IJMB Advanced  Level  and  National  Diploma  (ND)  certificates. In addition the ‘O’   Level requirements as indicated under (a) above must be met by each candidate. First degree with at least second class lower may be considered.
UTME Requirements: Candidate must have a minimum of five credit level passes at GCE/SSCE/NECO ‘O’ Level or equivalent in Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and English Language.
Subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
